scripts.docs:cost-analysis-pdf: if [ -f AI_COST_ANALYSIS.pdf ]; then echo "AI_COST_ANALYSIS.pdf already exists."; else node scripts/generate-cost-analysis-pdf.js; fi
scripts.test:e2e:emulator: firebase emulators:exec --only auth,firestore "ENABLE_E2E_LAB=1 PLAYWRIGHT_EMULATOR_MODE=1 NEXT_PUBLIC_USE_FIRESTORE_EMULATOR=true NEXT_PUBLIC_USE_AUTH_EMULATOR=true NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_API_KEY=demo-api-key NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_AUTH_DOMAIN=gauntlet-1-collab-board.firebaseapp.com NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_PROJECT_ID=gauntlet-1-collab-board NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_STORAGE_BUCKET=gauntlet-1-collab-board.appspot.com NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_MESSAGING_SENDER_ID=1234567890 NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_APP_ID=1:1234567890:web:demo FIREBASE_ADMIN_PROJECT_ID=gauntlet-1-collab-board FIRESTORE_EMULATOR_HOST=127.0.0.1:8080 FIREBASE_AUTH_EMULATOR_HOST=127.0.0.1:9099 npm run test:e2e -- e2e/firebase-emulator-auth-firestore.spec.ts"
scripts.test:e2e:ai-agent-calls:fallback: echo "Fallback MCP matrix is currently disabled and tracked as follow-up work. Run npm run test:e2e:ai-agent-calls:fallback:WIP to execute it."
scripts.test:e2e:ai-agent-calls:fallback:WIP: firebase emulators:exec --only auth,firestore "ENABLE_E2E_LAB=1 PLAYWRIGHT_EMULATOR_MODE=1 AI_PLANNER_MODE=deterministic-only AI_ENABLE_OPENAI=false NEXT_PUBLIC_USE_FIRESTORE_EMULATOR=true NEXT_PUBLIC_USE_AUTH_EMULATOR=true NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_API_KEY=demo-api-key NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_AUTH_DOMAIN=gauntlet-1-collab-board.firebaseapp.com NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_PROJECT_ID=gauntlet-1-collab-board NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_STORAGE_BUCKET=gauntlet-1-collab-board.appspot.com NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_MESSAGING_SENDER_ID=1234567890 NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_APP_ID=1:1234567890:web:demo FIREBASE_ADMIN_PROJECT_ID=gauntlet-1-collab-board FIRESTORE_EMULATOR_HOST=127.0.0.1:8080 FIREBASE_AUTH_EMULATOR_HOST=127.0.0.1:9099 npm run test:e2e -- --workers=1 --retries=0 e2e/ai-agent-call-matrix-fallback.spec.ts"
scripts.test:e2e:ai-agent-calls:openai-matrix:na: firebase emulators:exec --only auth,firestore "ENABLE_E2E_LAB=1 PLAYWRIGHT_EMULATOR_MODE=1 OPENAI_READY_VALIDATE=true AI_REQUIRE_OPENAI=true AI_PLANNER_MODE=openai-strict OPENAI_RUNTIME=agents-sdk AI_ENABLE_OPENAI=true OPENAI_MODEL=gpt-4.1-nano NEXT_PUBLIC_USE_FIRESTORE_EMULATOR=true NEXT_PUBLIC_USE_AUTH_EMULATOR=true NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_API_KEY=demo-api-key NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_AUTH_DOMAIN=gauntlet-1-collab-board.firebaseapp.com NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_PROJECT_ID=gauntlet-1-collab-board NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_STORAGE_BUCKET=gauntlet-1-collab-board.appspot.com NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_MESSAGING_SENDER_ID=1234567890 NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_APP_ID=1:1234567890:web:demo FIREBASE_ADMIN_PROJECT_ID=gauntlet-1-collab-board FIRESTORE_EMULATOR_HOST=127.0.0.1:8080 FIREBASE_AUTH_EMULATOR_HOST=127.0.0.1:9099 npm run test:e2e -- --workers=1 --retries=0 e2e/ai-agent-call-matrix-openai-nano.spec.ts"
scripts.test:e2e:ai-required-capabilities:openai: firebase emulators:exec --only auth,firestore "ENABLE_E2E_LAB=1 PLAYWRIGHT_EMULATOR_MODE=1 OPENAI_READY_VALIDATE=true AI_REQUIRE_OPENAI=true AI_PLANNER_MODE=openai-strict OPENAI_RUNTIME=agents-sdk AI_ENABLE_OPENAI=true OPENAI_MODEL=gpt-4.1-nano NEXT_PUBLIC_USE_FIRESTORE_EMULATOR=true NEXT_PUBLIC_USE_AUTH_EMULATOR=true NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_API_KEY=demo-api-key NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_AUTH_DOMAIN=gauntlet-1-collab-board.firebaseapp.com NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_PROJECT_ID=gauntlet-1-collab-board NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_STORAGE_BUCKET=gauntlet-1-collab-board.appspot.com NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_MESSAGING_SENDER_ID=1234567890 NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_APP_ID=1:1234567890:web:demo FIREBASE_ADMIN_PROJECT_ID=gauntlet-1-collab-board FIRESTORE_EMULATOR_HOST=127.0.0.1:8080 FIREBASE_AUTH_EMULATOR_HOST=127.0.0.1:9099 npm run test:e2e -- --workers=1 --retries=0 e2e/ai-required-capabilities-openai.spec.ts"
